title: Can't log in
body:
Whenever I try to open up the client, it doesn't open up. When I do it a second time, however, it will pop up almost immediately with a blank screen hovering over the top left of my screen blank; it's the same navy brick. I'm pretty sure this is just happening to me since most of my friends are logging perfectly. Please help me, and put it in simple terms as I'm not a very tech savvy person. 

If it helps, I'm using the beta client.

replies.body:
Can you try launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) to see if anything changes at all?

Let me know if this fixed it for you! ^.^

i have the exact same thing...  have since the new season started i restart my mac and keep trying and it just keeps loading a blank white screen in the corner and then wont let me close the client down either if anyone can help pls ;(
It also doesn't work if I run the game as admin. It's the same.
